amendment.description: To set aside an amount for the Anti-Sniper Infrared Targeting System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3525 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3525 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bunning. (consideration: CR S7379; text: CR S7379) To set aside an amount for the Anti-Sniper Infrared Targeting System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3525 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3525 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bunning.
